title: WTB!!  1910 T-209 Red Booles (MY great grandfather)!!
author: Joshwesley

posts.post_title: WTB!!  1910 T-209 Red Booles (MY great grandfather)!!
posts.post_content:
Hi,
   I'm brand new to tobacco cards and on a whim just figured by chance I would see if my great grandpa (who played for Cleveland) was included in the T series cards.
Low and behold, it exists!! 
Other than eBay, I have no idea how to get a hold of one. 

Fortunately in my google searches, I came across this site.
If anyone has any info of leads.. I would really appreciate it.

Thanks
[url]Jwhtennis777@yahoo.com[/url]

I may have a dupe of his T209-1 card... Will check tomorrow.

   Be well Brian

[quote name="Brian Weisner" post=1404270]I may have a dupe of his T209-1 card... Will check tomorrow.

   Be well Brian[/QUOTE]


Thanks Brian!

   Looking forward to hearing from you!

Josh
